resources.string: Privent.me uses Google Location Data from the past two weeks to predict if you had contact with the virus. This is done solely to help identify other virus carriers.
Your data is highly anonymized and remains private. It will never be sold or otherwise misused.
Privent.me is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have learned here.

By clicking \'I want to help\' I consent to have my anonymized data stored and analized for the purposes of COVID-19 prevention and prediction. Providing consent is voluntary. Consent may be revoked at any time.
